HediffDef.label: pyramid helmet
HediffDef.description: While the helmet doesn't contain any spikes, the sheer weight alone is enough to inflict pain. The design of the helmet also greatly obscures vision.

HediffDef.label: pyramid helmet (spikes)
HediffDef.description: This version of the helmet contains metal spikes on the inside, inflicting an immense amount of pain to anyone trapped inside it. The design of the helmet also greatly obscures vision.
